originalText.text: Just saw Dr. Singh today, and he quickly laid to rest 2 months of stress and worry. Gave a quick, comprehensive read of my imaging, and answered all my questions thoroughly, and with warmth. Great bedside manner--he met me where I was. Really hope I don't have to see him again soon, but if/when back issues require further interventions, I'm confident they'll be well-handled here. Thank you!

originalText.text: My interactions with Dr. Singh and his staff have been wonderful.  He was able to help me understand what was causing my back pain and devised a care plan that seems to be working. They are professional and attentive and create a positive outlook for treatment.

text.text: My interactions with Dr. Singh and his staff have been wonderful.  He was able to help me understand what was causing my back pain and devised a care plan that seems to be working. They are professional and attentive and create a positive outlook for treatment.

originalText.text:
I had an absolutely incredible experience with Dr. Singh and his entire team.
In my case, the procedure was effective and I'm still having relief from the pain, going on 12 weeks at this point. The follow up after the procedure by his team was nothing short of amazing.  I would happily recommend Dr. Singh to anyone needing his services.

originalText.text: I came to Dr. Singh having dealt with lower back pain for several years.  Unfortunately health issues have always prevented my taking steroidal medications, and prior physicians visits gave me little hope or relief.  Fortunately after some searching, I came upon a godsend… Dr. Singh.  He listened to my concerns, and developed with a plan to bring me back to myself.  After PT and injections, I’m feeling much better and grateful to Dr. Singh for his skill and calm, reassuring manner.

originalText.text: One of the best referrals from one doctor to another was, being referred to Dr. Singh. He has been nothing short of a fantastic provider helping me alleviate my pain. If it weren’t for his further assessment and testing, I would have never known I was going through more than what I was treated for. I highly recommend Dr. Singh and his team. I’m beginning to feel better now that I have working diagnoses due to Dr. Singh’s interventions.
